Eerie Presence.card_desc: [Mending Spirits] Reduce the Cooldown on Mending Spirits by {scale=0.5|0.5}s when you miss.

Feed the Spirits.card_desc: [Armor] Reduce all active cooldowns by {scale=10|10}% when getting an elimination.

Fleeting.card_desc: [Slither] Reduce the Cooldown of Slither by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Liminal Passage.card_desc: [Slither] Increase the distance Slither travels by {scale=10|10}%

Many Gourds.card_desc: [Gourd] Reduce the cooldown on Gourd by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Otherworldly.card_desc: [Slither] Gain {scale=10|10}% Movement Speed for 3s after Slither ends.

Possession.card_desc: [Mending Spirits] Gain {scale=4|4}% damage reduction while healing an ally with Mending Spirits.

Pungent Gourd.card_desc: [Gourd] Activating Gourd heals yourself for {scale=75|75} Health.

Ritual Magic.card_desc: [Mending Spirits] Heal for {scale=15|15} health per second while healing an ally with Mending spirits.

Spirit's Chosen.card_desc: [Mending Spirits] Mending Spirits heals for an additional 300 Health upfront.

Sustenance.card_desc: [Armor] Receive {scale=8|8}% more healing when below 50% health.

Swift Spirits.card_desc: [Mending Spirits] Mending Spirits grants {scale=7|7}% Movement Speed to allies.

Venomous Gourd.card_desc: [Gourd] You and Allies gain {scale=6|6}% Lifesteal while in Gourd.

Wekono's Curse.card_desc: [Mending Spirits] Mending Spirits may now be cast on enemies to deal 560 damage over 2s.

Wekono's Wrath.card_desc: [Weapon] Snake Toss is faster and deals an additional 500 damage.
